data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Lanao del Sur, Philippines honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lanao del Sur, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 453,568 believers in the state of Lanao del Sur to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, encourage your church in Lanao del Sur that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Lanao del Sur, Philippines to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Lanao del Sur, Philippines who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Lanao del Sur, Philippines.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Lanao del Sur, Philippines has a population of 3,256,100.

We estimate Lanao del Sur has 453,568 people who might know Jesus, 2,508,353 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 294,179 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Lanao del Sur who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Lanao del Sur
location.cities_list: Marawi City, Wao, Bayang, Butig, Malabang
location.cities_list_w_pop: Marawi City (143,627), Wao (17,845), Bayang (6,176), Butig (6,016), Malabang (4,354)
